Base Command¶

Implementing the basic SpaceWorld command.

class BaseCommand(*, name=None, aliases=None, func, big_docs=None, **opt)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class for SpaceWorld command implementations.

Encapsulates command behavior and metadata including: - Command execution (sync/async) - Help documentation generation - Parameter inspection - Activation modes - Deprecation status - Confirmation requirements

Variables:

  • name – Primary command name

  • aliases – Alternative command names

  • func – Callable implementation

Parameters:

  • name (None | str)

  • aliases (TypeAliasType | None)

  • func (TypeAliasType)

  • big_docs (None | str)

  • opt (Unpack[BaseCommandAnnotated])

__init__(*, name=None, aliases=None, func, big_docs=None, **opt)[source]¶

Initialize a new command instance.

Parameters:

  • name (None | str) – Command name (defaults to function name)

  • aliases (TypeAliasType | None) – Alternative command names

  • docs – Short description (defaults to function docstring)

  • examples – Usage example (auto-generated if empty)

  • activate_modes – Valid activation modes (default: [“normal”])

  • func (TypeAliasType) – Command implementation function

  • big_docs (None | str) – Detailed documentation (defaults to short docs)

  • hidden – If True, hides from help/autocomplete

  • deprecated – Deprecation flag or custom message

  • confirm – Confirmation requirement flag or custom prompt

  • history – If False, excludes from command history

  • opt (Unpack[BaseCommandAnnotated])

func: TypeAliasType¶
name: str¶
aliases: TypeAliasType¶
config: BaseCommandConfig¶

Lazily returns the is_async.

Return a large documentation on the function.

Returns:

returns the docs

Lazily returns the example table.

Returns:

example table

property parameters: Parameters¶

Return function parameters.

Returns:

Returns the signature of the command

get_msg()[source]¶

Возвращает кортеж сообщений.

Return type:

tuple[str, str]

Returns:

Сообщение об устаревшей команде и confirm команде

get_help_doc()[source]¶

Generate formatted help documentation for the command.

Return type:

str

Returns:

str –

Multi-line help text containing:

  • Name and aliases

  • Documentation

  • Usage example

  • Activation modes

  • Parameter details

  • Visibility status

  • Deprecation status

  • Confirmation requirements

generate_example(examples)[source]¶

Generate documentation for the team.

Parameters:

  • () (examples) – One example or a list of examples

  • examples (str | TypeAliasType)

Return type:

str

Returns:

example table
